#BlackMagicCraft #Episode179 #Dwarfs!

This video was sponsored by Titan Forge: http://www.titan-forge.com
Titan Forge Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/titanforgeminis
Titan Forge on MyMiniFactory: https://www.myminifactory.com/users/TitanForgeMiniatures

How is it possible that I don't have any dwarven themed terrain in my collection? Crazy right? Well it was time to change that. Built myself some modular dwarven style pillars with a cool steampunk twist. 

The dwarf minis were printed at home using my Anycubic Photon printer:
Anycubic Photon
(USA) https://amzn.to/38uFJuY
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2EaApyY
(UK) https://amzn.to/38uItsb
(Germany) https://amzn.to/358AH5f

Check out the TWS pillar build video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PADvPkF_4ig

title: Crafting DWARVEN PILLARS for Dungeons & Dragons - Awesome Scatter Terrain!
